mapper.select: select board_no, title, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%c-%e %T') as reg_date, view_count, board_type from t_board where board_type = #{boardType} order by board_no desc limit #{start}, 5
select board_no, title from t_board where board_type = #{boardType} and board_no > #{boardNo} limit 0, 1
select board_no, title from t_board where board_type = #{boardType} and board_no < #{boardNo} order by board_no desc limit 0, 1
select comment_no, content, id, board_no, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%c-%e %T') as reg_date from t_comment where board_no = #{boardNo} order by comment_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_comment (id, content, board_no) values (#{id}, #{content}, #{boardNo})
